elements.title: Baseline Survey
elements.text: In order to help us gain a better understanding of your thoughts, feelings and experiences, please complete the following questions. It will take approximately 10 minutes to complete today’s portion and about 4-10 minutes per day (2-5 minutes in the morning and 2-5 minutes in the evening) for the next 7 days.

For the next set of questions, you will use sliders to enter your responses. You can either slide the circle to the left or right OR simply tap the line to move the slider directly to your answers without sliding.

formattedText.template:
###### Below is a list of 16 behaviors that people may have trouble controlling. 
###### Please select **up to 4** of the behaviors that you have the **most trouble controlling**, **most frequently**. Please make sure to review the entire list before choosing.
###### Please select the ONE behavior from the **4** you chose that you have trouble controlling which is the most bothersome to you.

elements.text: The next couple of pages consist of a list of two opposite feelings, thoughts, or behaviors. Use the slider to choose where you generally fall between each pair of opposites. For example, if you are someone who gets distracted or has trouble focusing, you would move the slider closer to the “distracted” side.

For your MORNING survey, please choose a time within 2 hours of waking up that you would like to take your morning survey. Your alert will come any time within one hour after the time you choose. This can be modified at any point in Settings.

For your EVENING survey, please choose any time after 6pm (and at least 8 hours after your morning survey time). Your alert will come any time within one hour after the time you choose. This can be modified at any point in Settings.
Please add comments or questions about your experience answering these questions and using the app. You can come to this screen at any time.

elements.title: Thank you for completing the surveys!

formattedText.template:
###### Now, you will play some games. For baseline, you will complete full-length versions all at once. 

###### Then, you will only do one in the morning and one in the evening for the next 7 days. The games will take between 1-3 minutes to complete.

###### You will begin to receive notifications for your morning and evening surveys **starting tomorrow**. Once you begin to receive the notifications, refer to the “Pending Activities” list. Click “Done” to exit.
